item.title: The Ultimate Backup Constitution with rclone
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: My definitive guide to preventing data loss. This 'Backup Constitution' uses rclone to establish a robust, encrypted, and automated backup system on Linux.
